blog.content:
# The most essential list of resources for Front-End beginners

If you want to learn how to become a Front-End developer, you are in the right place!

I'm using some emoticons to give you more information on these links.

1. All links without a flag are in English. 
2. ğŸ’° are paid tutorials, ğŸ†“ are free tutorials. Sometimes you will have some free videos / articles and other paid on the same website.
3. ğŸ” indicate that the link is a reference
4. ğŸ“¹ is present when video content is available






---
## Start here
### Understand Internet
2.  [How Does the Internet Actually Work?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZonvMhT5c_Q) ğŸ“¹ ğŸ”
